main.name: Samuel Collins
main.occupation: Security and Privacy Technology Consultant at Protiviti
main.description: Here will be your description. Use this to describe what you do or whatever you feel best describes yourself to a potential employer
main.contactmessage: Please reach out if you would like to get in contact.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science and Business
education.description: Relevant Coursework - Software Engineering, Database Systems and Applications, Systems Software in C, Programming and Data Structures, Programming Languages, Discrete Structures and Algorithms, Financial Accounting, Managerial Accounting, Supply Chain Management, Finance.

work.title: Project Management Intern
work.description: In-person internship in Parsippany, NJ. Attended daily meetings to discuss permitting and construction of cell tower sited. Performed data analytics using Microsoft Excel and Power BI to assist in decision making. Discovered data integrity issues affecting over 9,000 rows of data in the NJ market.

work.title: Technology Consulting Intern
work.description: Remote internship in Prague, Czech Republic. Performed analysis of SAP S/4HANA and SAP CM Enterprise Resource Planning systems. Created a consulting style presentation highlighting SAP S/4HANA and SAP CM features, applications, and implementation in relevant businesses. Presented findings to team leaders and sponsors at Deloitte.

work.company: Lehigh Computer Science and Business Association (CSBA)
work.title: Vice President, Former Secretary
work.description: Organize professional events for Computer Science and Business students at Lehigh. Assign and manage mentors for every incoming Computer Science and Business student. Assist students at Lehigh University in selecting classes and professional preparation.

work.company: Sigma Phi Delta, Professional Engineering Fraternity
work.title: Professional Chairman, Former Academic Chairman, Professional Communications Chairman
work.description: Network with organizations on campus to facilitate professional and philantrophy events for Lehigh students. Promote educational opportunities both on and off campus.

projects.name: Lehigh Merck Capstone Project
projects.description: Developed a web app specific to Merck workflows using React and NodeJS. Worked in an agile environment with 3 other students, faculty advisor, and Merck Employee.

projects.name: Lehigh CSE 241 Insurance Company Project
projects.description: Built a relational database with Oracle SQL to simulate a system that would be used by an insurance company. Created ER diagrams using Lucid Chart based on business requirements. Used JDBC to create an application for multiple types of users to interact with database.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
